II.iii.2.G.2.c
.
Claims Mentioning Exposure but Not Specifying a Disability
A claim mentioning an exposure but not specifying a disability from the exposure is not substantially complete.
Reference
:Â  For more information on claims that do not specify a disability but allege exposure, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C.2.c
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section G - Requests for Application and Claims Solicitation
citation: Part II, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section G
